name: R5-AppointmentResponse-R4-AppointmentResponse
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 AppointmentResponse into FHIR R4

element.display: A reply to an appointment request for a patient and/or practitioner(s), such as a confirmation or rejection

target.display: A reply to an appointment request for a patient and/or practitioner(s), such as a confirmation or rejection
target.comment: R5 `AppointmentResponse` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse`

R5 `AppointmentResponse.actor` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AppointmentResponse.actor` - actor has change due to type change: R5 `actor` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `actor`
R5 `AppointmentResponse.appointment` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse.appointment`

R5 `AppointmentResponse.comment` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AppointmentResponse.comment` - comment has change due to type change: R5 comment markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 comment
R5 `AppointmentResponse.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse.contained`

element.display: Time from appointment, or requested new end time

target.display: Time from appointment, or requested new end time
target.comment: R5 `AppointmentResponse.end` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse.end`

R5 `AppointmentResponse.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AppointmentResponse.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `AppointmentResponse.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse.id`
R5 `AppointmentResponse.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `AppointmentResponse.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse.implicitRules`

R5 `AppointmentResponse.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `AppointmentResponse.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `AppointmentResponse.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse.meta`

R5 `AppointmentResponse.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `AppointmentResponse.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Original date within a recurring request

target.comment: R5 `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus` - (participantStatus failed to compare required binding of http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/appointmentresponse-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/participationstatus|4.0.1); participantStatus has change due to type change: R5 `participantStatus` `code` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `participantStatus`

element.display: Role of participant in the appointment

target.display: Role of participant in the appointment
target.comment: R5 `AppointmentResponse.participantType` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse.participantType`

element.display: The recurrence ID of the specific recurring request
This response is for all occurrences in a recurring request
Time from appointment, or requested new start time

target.display: Time from appointment, or requested new start time
target.comment: R5 `AppointmentResponse.start` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse.start`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `AppointmentResponse.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `AppointmentResponse.text`
